DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; NETHERLANDS ; DOCUMENTARY FIRST TO SHOW EUTHANASIA
DOC.TEXT: A documentary chronicling the mercy killing of a severely debilitated man was shown on Dutch television in the first known filming of euthanasia in the Netherlands.The one-hour documentary , " Death Upon Request , " told the story of Cees van Wendel de Joode , who suffered from the degenerative muscle disorder Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis , also known as Lou Gehrig ' s Disease . Van Wendel de Joode was believed to be 55 . While mercy_killing is still officially illegal in the_Netherlands , doctors are guaranteed immunity from prosecution if they follow the euthanasia policy , the most liberal in the industrialized world .
